unnormalised: Zolm zal'lea bhurgeank, sadharan tapman 97.5-99.5째F aspas asta, ani zanttleponnachea bhurgeank tap 100.4째F poros chodd aslear Calpol (Paracetamol) sarkhea vokhdacho dosacho zankari sodanch tumchea pediatricianak vicharat.
normalised: Zolm zal'lea bhurgeank, sadharan tapman suvatt'tis ponchhattor te ekunnavad ponchhattor degree fahrenheit asta, ani zori bhurgeak ek shambar point char degree fahrenheit poros chodd tap asl'lear Calpol (Paracetamol) sarkhea vokhdamche praman kitlench gheunk zai mhunn tumchea pediatrician kodden nischit vicharun gheiat.
text: Zolm zal'lea bhurgeank, sadharan tapman 97.5-99.5째F aspas asta, ani zanttleponnachea bhurgeank tap 100.4째F poros chodd aslear Calpol (Paracetamol) sarkhea vokhdacho dosacho zankari sodanch tumchea pediatricianak vicharat.
